abstract: Tensions have flared up in the Niger Delta, the site of much of the country’s oil production, after deeply flawed presidential elections last month.
snippet: Tensions have flared up in the Niger Delta, the site of much of the country’s oil production, after deeply flawed presidential elections last month.
lead_paragraph: The violence that has gripped Nigeria’s main oil region for the last year is again on the rise after weeks of an uneasy truce.

headline.main: Renewed Violence Limits Oil Production in Nigerian Region
headline.print_headline: Renewed Violence Limits Oil Production in Nigerian Region
